sub_title: CA | SAP Finance Transformation Consultant (Pre Sales & Implementation) | Certified in SAP S/4 HANA Cloud - Finance & SAP Activate Methodology | SaaS Deployment for Digital Transformation
summary:
I am a qualified Chartered Accountant with broad experience in various aspects of accounting, taxation, auditing, assurance, compliance, financial reporting and financial management. 

I am also a certified finance consultant in SAP S4 HANA Cloud and SAP Activate methodology.

At Accenture, had extensive experience in the implementation of SAP ERP - Cloud solutions. 
I am performing the lead FIN consultant role for the development, estimation, resource plan and roadmap for Digital Transformation Program.
Have handled clients ranging from the IT sector, the manufacturing sector, Oil & Gas sector and Communication for well-known companies based in the US and European countries. 

I worked as a senior consultant role in 7 major multi-country implementation projects and played the functional lead role for 8 core implementation projects in US, EMEA and APAC regions.

S4 HANA On-Premise, Public and Private Cloud project:
Project 1: US-based company - Financial services - Multi-country implementation (16 countries)
Project 2: US-based company - Professional services - Multi-country implementations (30 countries)
Project 3: Netherland based Company - Oil and Gas Industry -  S4 HANA Cloud Business case 
Project 4: Netherlands based company - Agricultural Product Industry - Multi-country implementation 
Project 5: Netherlands based - Internal project, capability building Defense and Security Industry
Project 6: US-based, Life Sciences Industry, Multi-country AO Support Project (3 countries)
Project 7: Global CoEX - SAP Cloud ERP Capability building and S4 HC FIN expertise building 
Project 8:  Netherlands based - SAP S4 HANA Implementation, Energy Industry (4 countries) 
Project 9:  US-based - SAP S4 HANA Cloud Support Engagement, Automobile Industry (12 countries)
Project 10: Switzerland based - SAP S4 HANA Cloud Implementation - Industrial Services (47 countries)

SAP Business ByDesign Public and Private Cloud projects:
Project 1: US-based company – Travel Industry 
Project 2: UK based company – Media Industry 
Project 3: Germany-based company – Manufacturing Industry 
Project 4: Poland-based company – Oil and Gas Industry - Retail 
Project 5: Vietnam based company - Oil and Gas Industry-Downstream, Multi-Country Imp. 
Project 6: UK based company - AO Project - SAP Business ByDesign.
Project 7: US-based company - AO Project - SAP Business ByDesign. 
Project 8: US-based company - Healthcare - Multi-country implementation (30 countries)
Project 9: Netherlands based company - NGO - Multi-country implementation (27 countries)

treasury_media.title: SAP Certified Application Associate - SAP S/4HANA Cloud - Finance Implementation 2020
SAP Certified Application Associate - SAP S/4HANA Cloud - essentials edition implementation with SAP Activate
SAP Intelligent RPA technology
treasury_media.description: Robotic process automation (RPA) helps reduce human error by automating business process-related manual tasks, increasing speed and lowering the total cost of ownership by saving you time and effort. Adding intelligence, which is what SAP Intelligent Robotic Process Automation does, means automated decision making, which leads to additional savings through the reduction of analytical effort.

treasury_media.title: SAP Cloud ALM
treasury_media.description: SAP Cloud ALM, a brand new, cloud-based application lifecycle management offering, guides you successfully through the implementation and operation of your cloud solutions to maximize their value.

treasury_media.title: SAP Central Business Configuration
treasury_media.description: SAP Central Business Configuration is a new tool that will make it possible to configure a business process spanning different SAP solutions from one central place. SAP Central Business Configuration supports the configuration of SAP S/4HANA Cloud, but aims at seamless implementation of end-to-end business processes across SAP’s entire Intelligent Enterprise Suite. Every new SAP S/4HANA Cloud customer uses SAP Central Business Configuration for their implementation.

treasury_media.title: SAP’s Integrated Intelligent Suite
treasury_media.description: An introduction to the Integrated Intelligent Enterprise, its strategic importance for SAP, and an overview of the end-to-end processes. The Business Technology Platform and SAP Cloud Platform Integration Suite are presented as well.

profile_positions.description:

Experience in Designing complex SAP solutions based on SAP S\4 HANA Best Practices.
Certified and Experienced in SAP implementation in agile methodology using SAP Activate.
Experienced in Integration, migration, cutover and business application support in various cloud deployments.
